statements: SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_link FROM recommendations WHERE resource_type = 'book';
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM recommendations WHERE student_id = 2 AND resource_type = 'article';
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_type FROM recommendations WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM recommendations WHERE student_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM recommendations WHERE resource_type = 'book';
SELECT * FROM recommendations ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM recommendations;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS recommendation_count FROM recommendations GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, interests FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM LearningResources WHERE subject_area='Mathematics' AND difficulty_level < 5;
SELECT resource_name, rating FROM LearningResources ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 5;
SELECT student_name, interests FROM Students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT resource_name, subject_area, difficulty_level FROM LearningResources WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, subject_area FROM LearningResources WHERE difficulty_level < 3 ORDER BY resource_type ASC, resource_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name, interests FROM students WHERE interests @> '["swimming"]';
SELECT course_name, teacher_name FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, total_students FROM courses WHERE total_students > 20;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name, interests->>'sports' FROM students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT student_name, course_name, interest_level FROM students INNER JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON student_interests.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE interest_level >= 3;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE total_students > 20 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id, course_name FROM students JOIN student_interests USING (student_id) JOIN courses USING (course_id);
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, course_level FROM courses WHERE course_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_courses WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT resource_name FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_level FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students s JOIN student_courses sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id JOIN courses c ON sc.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_name, course_level FROM courses WHERE course_level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT subject, course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, favorite_subject FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE enrollments.course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE subject = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, resource_name FROM students INNER JOIN recommendations ON students.student_id = recommendations.student_id WHERE recommendations.suggested_date >= DATE('2022-01-01');

SELECT student_name, favorite_subject, course_name FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE students.student_id = 1;
